answers.text: the onset of the Great Depression

qas.question: In what year did The wall Street crash occur?
When did the great Depression end?
The great depression is the worst economic downturn of what century?

context: Worldwide prosperity changed dramatically with <a0_0>the onset of the Great Depression<a0_0/> in 1929. The Wall Street Crash of <a1_0>1929<a1_0/> served to punctuate the end of the previous era, as The Great Depression set in. The Great Depression was <a2_0>a worldwide economic downturn<a2_0/> starting in most places in 1929 and ending at different times in the <a3_0>1930s or early 1940s<a3_0/> for different countries. It was the largest and most important economic depression in the <a4_0>20th century<a4_0/>, and is used in the 21st century as an example of how far the world's economy can fall.
